newsitem.title: USA: Elsag Bailey Process gets $20 mln contract.
newsitem.headline: Elsag Bailey Process gets $20 mln contract.

text.p: Elsag Bailey Process Automation NV said Wednesday it has been awarded contracts totalling more than $20 million to automate the new Ratchaburi Power Station in Wat Phikun Thong, Thailand.
The company said the 3200 Megawatt station, which is to be operated by the Electricity Generating Authority of Thailand, will be one of the largest power generating facilities in the world.

Automation systems for the project will be supplied jointly by three Elsag Bailey operating companies: Elsag Bailey (Canada) Inc will provide controls for the thermal units; Bailey Controls Company (USA) will automate the combined cycle units; and Elsag Bailey Pte Ltd (Singapore) is responsible for automation of on-site water/wastewater treatment facilities.
